trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Faerl has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Faerl adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, he must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
